name: Abducted In Space
description:
Description

The game will be set in a space station where our protagonist is held. The station is controlled by an army of robots from another world whose mission is to find beings from other planets and study them.

The main mission will be to escape from the laboratory where they are preparing to dissect our protagonist and escape from the space station through an emergency capsule using his wits and his weapons/abilities.

Controls
  • Cursor to aim
  • Left click to shoot
  • Right click to zoom in aiming
  • WASD to move
  • F key to interact
  • X key to interact within the puzzle
  • Escape key to pause
